title: Growth Link (Part 1)
body:
Growth Link (Part 1)

(Error!---)

(The level of the shadow necromancer class is too high....)

(Can't increase the level of your class....)

When Evan saw these notifications, all the excitement he was feeling to see the improvement of his class instantly vanished.

He held his chest trying to surpass the pain he was feeling in his heart.

His fragile heart wasn't able to take this hot and cold treatment anymore. He looked at the three notifications with a lifeless look on his face.

What the hell is wrong with this world?

Did he offend the mother of this world?

He just wanted to increase the rank of his core. Why make his life so difficult?

Just when Evan was doubting his life few more notifications flashed before his eyes.

(Creating a new class-specific skill related to your shadow necromancer class)

(Extracting knowledge from 'Shadow Ebonmancer Class' to create a new skill)

(Congratulations!)
